org.alljoyn.services.common

Interface PropertyStore


  • public interface PropertyStore
    A generic Property store definition. Needs to be implemented per platform. The application creates this store and passes it to the About and Config services that use it for Announcements and for Get/Set data support. The application is responsible for the persistence of this store.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PropertyStore.Filter
      Classifies the properties by purpose: for announcement, for get-about, for get-config

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void readAll(String languageTag, PropertyStore.Filter filter, Map<String,Object> dataMap)
      Get all the properties that are stored for the given language
      void reset(String key, String languageTag)
      Reset a property for a given language
      void resetAll()
      Reset all the properties in the store
      void update(String key, String languageTag, Object newValue)
      Update a property value for a given language.

    • Method Detail

      • readAll

        void readAll(String languageTag,
           PropertyStore.Filter filter,
           Map<String,Object> dataMap)
             throws PropertyStoreException
        Get all the properties that are stored for the given language
        Parameters:
        languageTag -
        filter - classifies the properties to get: for announcement, for get-about, for get-config
        dataMap - the map to fill
        Throws:
        PropertyStoreException - if language is not supported.

      • update

        void update(String key,
          String languageTag,
          Object newValue)
            throws PropertyStoreException
        Update a property value for a given language.
        Parameters:
        key - the property name
        languageTag - the language in which this property should be set
        newValue - the property value
        Throws:
        PropertyStoreException - if language isn't supported, key not found, or illegal value

      • reset

        void reset(String key,
         String languageTag)
           throws PropertyStoreException
        Reset a property for a given language
        Parameters:
        key - the property name
        languageTag - the language in which this property should be set
        Throws:
        PropertyStoreException - if language isn't supported, or key not found

      • resetAll

        void resetAll()
              throws PropertyStoreException
        Reset all the properties in the store
        Throws:
        PropertyStoreException
